## 📊 Section Details

### 1. COMPUTEX TAIPEI 2025 Research Trip Report
*Pages 1-3*

Here’s a 2-3 sentence summary of the provided report:

The research trip to Taipei, part of the COMPUTEX Taipei 2025 event, focused on evaluating Intel’s GPU and graphics card technology, particularly the Xe architecture for AI applications.  Participants visited key exhibition halls including Taipei Nangang and Foxconn, showcasing advancements in high-performance servers, AI computing infrastructure, and innovative technologies like Acer’s wearable devices and Nvidia’s GB300 NVL72.
